name: prisma-zod-generator
description: Prisma generator that emits Zod schemas.

scripts.postbuild: bun build lib/generator.js --target=node --format=cjs --minify --no-bundle --outfile lib/generator.min.js && mv lib/generator.min.js lib/generator.js && bun -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='lib/generator.js';const s=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');if(!s.startsWith('#!')) fs.writeFileSync(p,'#!/usr/bin/env node\\n'+s);"
